summary: VEHICLE HESITATED/LOST POWER UPON ENTERING 55MPH HIGHWAY.  TOOK TO DEALER, WAITING ON CLUTCH.  SALES PERSON HAD TOLD ME THIS VEHICLE HAD REDESIGNED TRANSMISSION.  AT FIRST IT PERFORMED MUCH SMOOTHER THAN MY 2012 FORD FIESTA.  NOT NOW.  SERVICE DEPT. CLAIMS NEW CLUTCH IS MUCH BETTER.  THERE IS A CLASS ACTION SUIT AGAINST FORD NOW FOR "POWER SHIFT" TRANSMISSION.
